## ShortcutRegistry.register() method

Registers a keyboard shortcut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(shortcut: KeyboardShortcut, allowOverrides?: boolean): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

The shortcut for this key code.


</td></tr>

allowOverrides


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ True to prevent a warning when overriding an already registered item.
